entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
